LanguageData.Gun_ChargeCarbine.label: charge carbine
LanguageData.Gun_ChargeCarbine.description: A short ranged version of the standard charge rifle. Its KAR-BINE not CAH-BINE.
LanguageData.Gun_ChargeCarbine.tools.stock.label: stock
LanguageData.Gun_ChargeCarbine.tools.barrel.label: barrel
LanguageData.Gun_ChargeCarbine.verbs.Verb_Shoot.label: charge carbine
LanguageData.Gun_ChargeDMR.label: charge dmr
LanguageData.Gun_ChargeDMR.description: Designated Marksman Rifle. Like an ancient survival rifle but its chargy this time!
LanguageData.Gun_ChargeDMR.tools.stock.label: stock
LanguageData.Gun_ChargeDMR.tools.barrel.label: barrel
LanguageData.Gun_ChargeDMR.verbs.Verb_Shoot.label: charge dmr
LanguageData.Gun_ChargeLMG.label: charge lmg
LanguageData.Gun_ChargeLMG.description: An uncommon bullpup "laser machine gun". The designer didnt like the additional C.
LanguageData.Gun_ChargeLMG.tools.stock.label: stock
LanguageData.Gun_ChargeLMG.tools.barrel.label: barrel
LanguageData.Gun_ChargeLMG.verbs.Verb_Shoot.label: charge lmg
LanguageData.Gun_ChargeMinigun.label: charge minigun
LanguageData.Gun_ChargeMinigun.description: A laser minigun with an ludicrously high magazine capacity but a high charge time. Popular with bounty hunters. The main downside is identifing the bodies.
LanguageData.Gun_ChargeMinigun.tools.barrels.label: barrels
LanguageData.Gun_ChargeMinigun.verbs.Verb_Shoot.label: charge minigun
LanguageData.Gun_ChargePistol.label: Charge pistol
LanguageData.Gun_ChargePistol.description: Light amplified by the stimulated emission of radiation in two-shot pistol form!
LanguageData.Gun_ChargePistol.tools.grip.label: grip
LanguageData.Gun_ChargePistol.tools.barrel.label: barrel
LanguageData.Gun_ChargePistol.verbs.Verb_Shoot.label: Charge pistol
LanguageData.Gun_ChargeShotgun.label: charge shotgun
LanguageData.Gun_ChargeShotgun.description: The ancient design required laser amplification to improve it. Your enemies become slightly more spread out with each use.
LanguageData.Gun_ChargeShotgun.tools.stock.label: stock
LanguageData.Gun_ChargeShotgun.tools.barrel.label: barrel
LanguageData.Gun_ChargeShotgun.verbs.Verb_Shoot.label: charge shotgun
LanguageData.Gun_ChargeSMG.label: charge smg
LanguageData.Gun_ChargeSMG.description: This SMG is highly damaging, accurate and deadly in the right hands, even if it trades a short charge time for a longer reload time.
LanguageData.Gun_ChargeSMG.tools.grip.label: grip
LanguageData.Gun_ChargeSMG.tools.barrel.label: barrel
LanguageData.Gun_ChargeSMG.verbs.Verb_Shoot.label: charge smg
LanguageData.Gun_ChargeSniper.label: charge sniper rifle
LanguageData.Gun_ChargeSniper.description: High damage and light weight makes for a brutal combination. Technically bolt action. Prefered gun of any respectable contract killer.
LanguageData.Gun_ChargeSniper.tools.stock.label: stock
LanguageData.Gun_ChargeSniper.tools.barrel.label: barrel
LanguageData.Gun_ChargeSniper.verbs.Verb_Shoot.label: charge sniper rifle
LanguageData.Gun_Coilgun.label: coilgun
LanguageData.Gun_Coilgun.description: Coilguns use high powered electromagnets to launch a obliterating projectile over an incredibly long distance. Of course, the capacitor charges incredibly slowly to increase its incredibility.
LanguageData.Gun_Coilgun.tools.barrel.label: barrel
LanguageData.Gun_Coilgun.verbs.Verb_Shoot.label: coilgun
LanguageData.Gun_FlameThrower.label: flame thrower
LanguageData.Gun_FlameThrower.description: One deranged colonist from that possibly friendly midworld colony expanded on the "hairspray and lighter" concept a while ago. Pyromaniacs praise said colonist as their deity.
LanguageData.Gun_FlameThrower.tools.stock.label: stock
LanguageData.Gun_FlameThrower.tools.barrel.label: barrel
LanguageData.Gun_FlameThrower.verbs.Verb_Shoot.label: flame thrower
LanguageData.Gun_FlechetteShotgun.label: flechette shotgun
LanguageData.Gun_FlechetteShotgun.description: Similar design to the Pump shotgun, only it uses heavy "flechettes", which are practically darts. Perfect for pub games on your enemies.
LanguageData.Gun_FlechetteShotgun.tools.stock.label: stock
LanguageData.Gun_FlechetteShotgun.tools.barrel.label: barrel
LanguageData.Gun_HyperborealRifle.label: hyperboreal rifle
LanguageData.Gun_HyperborealRifle.description: Pyromaniacs tend to fear this quantum ice cream maker, ironically due it being their version of hell.
LanguageData.Gun_HyperborealRifle.tools.stock.label: stock
LanguageData.Gun_HyperborealRifle.tools.barrel.label: barrel
LanguageData.Gun_PotatoLauncher.label: potato launcher
LanguageData.Gun_PotatoLauncher.description: The designers of this weapon thought it would be funny to go for something off the hook. What they made was exactly that... and then some. Coleslaw not included.
LanguageData.Gun_PotatoLauncher.tools.stock.label: stock
LanguageData.Gun_PotatoLauncher.tools.barrel.label: barrel
LanguageData.Gun_TaserPistol.label: taser pistol
LanguageData.Gun_TaserPistol.description: Taking high voltage to your body is an acquired tased
LanguageData.Gun_TaserPistol.tools.grip.label: grip
LanguageData.Gun_TaserPistol.tools.barrel.label: barrel
LanguageData.Gun_TaserPistol.verbs.Verb_Shoot.label: taser pistol
LanguageData.Gun_TaserRifle.label: taser rifle
LanguageData.Gun_TaserRifle.description: This rifle has an absolutely stunning display to show your friends!
LanguageData.Gun_TaserRifle.tools.stock.label: stock
LanguageData.Gun_TaserRifle.tools.barrel.label: barrel
